page.title: 20The Campus
page.content: On the{Houghton Regis}campus there are three schools.Two schools are middle schools and the other is an upper school. {Brandreth}is one middle school and {Linmear}is another.Linmear has the pupils who have a surname beginning with the letters A-L and Brandreth have the pupils from M-Z.The ages you have to be to go to one of these Middle Schools is 9-13 years old.It is possible for parents to transfer their children to a different Middle School. {Houghton Regis Upper School}is the last school you have to go to.The age you have to be to go to the Upper School is 13-16.There are three years the third,fourth and fifth.There is an extra year called the sixth year. It has its own Sports Centre and Swimming pool,which is used by all the schools.
